ai-tha-ap511:1.1_0: “The Buddha is the best of head:
ai-tha-ap511:1.2_0: if they sleep like a sage should beamed;
ai-tha-ap511:1.4_0: I went out of my resort.
ai-tha-ap511:2.1_0: I’ve seen fruits in the fruit,
ai-tha-ap511:2.4_0: the fruit of that palm tree,
ai-tha-ap511:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap511:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap511:5.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap511:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tāḷapuṭa.
ai-tha-ap511:8.1_0: ( for) the Fruits of palm fruits, for the Elder Nuns
